alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Eastland and southern Stephens Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gunsight, or 12 miles south of Breckenridge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastland, Ranger, Necessity and Gunsight. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 342 and 351. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
